results.title: [Metformin--new treatment strategies for gynecologic neoplasms].
results.text_hl: Latest findings show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has an anticancer effect.

citations.NLM: Milewicz T, Kiałka M, Mrozińska S, Ociepka A, Krzysiek J. [Metformin--new treatment strategies for gynecologic neoplasms]. Przegl Lek. 2013;70(2):81-4. PMID: 23879009

results.title: Old drug, new trick: repurposing metformin for gynecologic cancers?
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Pre-clinical studies in @<m>DISEASE_Uterine_Cervicitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002575 @@@endometrial, ovarian, and cervical cancer@@@ suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibits the growth of @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Febbraro T, Lengyel E, Romero IL. Old drug, new trick: repurposing metformin for gynecologic cancers? Gynecol Oncol. 2014 Dec;135(3):614-21. PMID: 25455733
citations.BibTeX: @article{25455733, title={Old drug, new trick: repurposing metformin for gynecologic cancers?}, author={Febbraro T and Lengyel E and Romero IL}, journal={Gynecol Oncol}, volume={135}, number={3}, pages={614-21}}
